page.title: 14Leisure Activities S.on A.
page.content: Here are two reports by 11 year old club members on types of Recreation to be found at the Leisure Centre. "I play squash.There are 4 squash courts and it costs Â£1.50 for a 40 minute court.There is a squash ladder. If no one is booked after you, you may play on.The lights do not go off.I play on Sunday mornings against Grant, Stephen or Dad." "S.O.A.K.meet on Thursday night at 7pm.It is 50p for 15 min. in a canoe plus an hour swimming at the side which is a bit boring.It is Â£3 to join but you can still canoe without membership.You have to join to take the Star Tests.There is the One Star Award,the Two Star Award,and the Three Star Award.In the pool you practise Eskimo rolling, capsize drill, slap supports, hip flips,and forward and backward rowing."
